Career History (Key Achievements)
Siemens Intelligent Traffic Solutions - Poole
Senior Production Manager                                                       December 2019 – Present
Currently the Senior Production Manger at Siemens Intelligent Traffic Systems, reporting directly to the Head of Global Manufacturing.
My current team is in excess of 80 with 7 direct reports including 2 Materials Managers and 6 Cell Leaders.
I have the responsibility of leading the  4 main Cells within the Poole manufacturing facility; German traffic systems, UK and ROW traffic systems, Rail and UK and German Projects
Void Acoustics - Poole
Head of Operations (UK and China)                                          July 2019 – December 2019
Was solely accountable for the management of Operations over 3 sites, UK, China and USA. This comprised of a team of 100, this included 8 Managers who reported directly to myself. I reported directly to the Managing Director.
The business had a global turnover of £12M+
Spent four successful and demanding  months in Zencheng China creating a business structure and model to support the facility in UK and distribution centre in USA. This included recruitment, transfer of foreign ownership, all aspects of Production and Operations as well as creating financial targets to ensure business could be viable, working with our Chinese suppliers – I negotiated an overall saving of 35% on supplies parts, creating more forecasting enabling more bulk orders to be placed.
I  received 50% of my annual bonus after 4 months on my return to UK having identified and put in place corrective actions to resolve the business in China which was operating at a loss. The business structure was changed to a cost centre and the GPM adjusted.
I also orchestrated a warehouse move to create 4 sites for the business allowing more manufacturing space and product storage in UK.
